destroy() - Method in class GlooKit.GlooAPI.TextureAtlas
Deletes the existing GPU texture by calling the GL11.glDeleteTextures(int texture) method This does not destroy the TextureAtlas, but merely deallocates its memory in the GPU

destroy() - Method in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.GlooApplication
Overrides the destroy() method of KitBit to prevent the GlooApplication from trying to remove itself from its parent (it has none).
destroy() - Method in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.KitBit
Destroy this KitBit by ripping (removing) it from its parent's list of children after recursively calling destroy() on each of the children of this KitBit.

drawChildren(float) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.KitBit

drawFrame(float, float, float, float, float) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.ColSpan
Overrides the drawFrame(float, float, float, float, float) method of Div to properly calculate the position of all of the children of this ColSpan before calling drawFrame on each of the children.
drawFrame(float, float, float, float, float) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.Div
Overrides the drawFrame(float, float, float, float, float) method of KitBit to also call the drawChildren(float) method of KitBit, which ensures that drawFrame() is recursively called on the children of this Div
drawFrame() - Method in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.GlooApplication
Initiates the process of rendering to the screen.
drawFrame(float, float, float, float, float) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.KitBit
Prepares this element for drawing by instructing this KitBit's frame and label to draw themselves through the frame.draw(float, float, float, float, float) and label.draw(float, float, float, float, float) methods.
drawFrame(float, float, float, float, float) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.Nook
Overrides the drawFrame(float, float, float, float, float) method of KitBit to also call the drawChildren(float) method of KitBit, which ensures that drawFrame() is recursively called on the children of this Nook
drawFrame(float, float, float, float, float) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.RowSpan
Overrides the drawFrame(float, float, float, float, float) method of Div to properly calculate the position of all of the children of this RowSpan before calling drawFrame on each of the children.
